description: The capital city of the Alabasta Kingdom where the final battles of the Alabasta arc take place.

keyEvents.description: The battle between Zoro and Mr. 1 takes place in the streets and buildings of Alubarna.
keyEvents.significance: One of several simultaneous battles occurring throughout the capital city.

keyEvents.description: Zoro defeats Mr. 1 in Alubarna using his newly learned ability to cut steel.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the conclusion of one of the major Officer Agent battles in the capital.

description: Zoro's home village in the East Blue, where he trained at Koushirou's dojo.

keyEvents.description: Flashback to Shimotsuki Village showing young Zoro training with master Koushirou, learning the philosophy of cutting and not cutting.
keyEvents.significance: This flashback provides the key to Zoro's breakthrough in the present, showing how his master's teachings guide him even years later.
